entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 01:51 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 86 %

Dewpoint: -6.1°C

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
